title: California Firm Recalls Veal Trimmings Due to Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, January 30, 2013 - San Jose Valley Veal, a Santa Clara, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,260 pounds of veal trimmings that may be contaminated with E. Coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The following...
impacted_products: 60-pound, cardboard box cases of "SAN JOSE VALLEY VEAL AND BEEF INC." boneless veal trimmings.
